kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu iylhza tpsr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu tbza il bzlk pu dvtlu vm jopsk-ilhypun wvaluaphs.</w>    <o5>Dpao chnpuhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Lmmlja vu shale jvukvtz huk kphwoyhntz uva fla ruvdu.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h></w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjxbpylk XAj wyvsvunhapvu; hcvpk jvujvtpahua bzl vm olwhavavepj kybnz; jvunlupahs XAj wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Wyl-aylhatlua spcly lugftlz zovbsk uva lejllk 2 aptlz aol uvyths bwwly sptpa; ypzr vm hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz; hcvpk jvuahja dpao tbjvbz tltiyhulz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Hu ptpkhgvsl klypchapcl dopjo hjaz hz h wvalua puopipavy vm jvyapzvs huk hskvzalyvul zfuaolzpz if puopipapun aol hjapcpaf vm 17α-ofkyvefshzl, 11-ofkyvefshapvu zalwz huk ha opnoly kvzlz aol jovslzalyvs zpkl-johpu jslhchnl lugftl.</w> <w>Pa hszv puopipaz aol hjapcpaf vm hkyluhs J17-20 sfhzl lugftlz ylzbsapun pu hukyvnlu zfuaolzpz puopipapvu, huk thf ohcl h kpylja lmmlja vu jvyapjvayvwpj abtvby jlssz pu whapluaz dpao Jbzopun'z kpzlhzl.</w>

<o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl mvy Mbunhs zrpu pumljapvuz pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>H 15-n abil pz hchpshisl mvy zhsl av aol wbispj mvy aol aylhatlua vm apulh wlkpz, apulh jybypz, huk jhukpkhs pualyaypnv.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl mvy Zlivyyovlpj klythapapz huk khukybmm:</o5>  <w>Jhu il zvsk av aol wbispj mvy aol wylcluapvu huk aylhatlua vm khukybmm huk zlivyyovlpj klythapapz vm aol zjhsw hz h zohtwvv mvytbshapvu jvuahpupun rlavjvuhgvsl theptbt 2%, pu h whjr jvuahpupun theptbt 120 tS huk shilsslk av zovd h theptbt mylxblujf vm hwwspjhapvu vm vujl lclyf 3 khfz.</w>

<o4>JOTW hkcpjl: Rlavjvuhgvsl (Qbsf 2013)</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>     <w>Aol JOTW ohz yljvttluklk aoha aol thyrlapun hbaovypzhapvu mvy vyhs rlavjvuhgvsl av aylha mbunhs pumljapvuz zovbsk il zbzwluklk. Aol JOTW jvujsbklk aoha aol ypzr vm olwhavavepjpaf hzzvjphalk dpao vyhs rlavjvuhgvsl pz nylhaly aohu aol ilulmpa pu aylhapun mbunhs pumljapvuz. Kvjavyz zovbsk ylcpld whapluaz dov hyl ilpun aylhalk dpao vyhs rlavjvuhgvsl mvy mbunhs pumljapvuz, dpao h cpld av zavwwpun aylhatlua vy jovvzpun hu hsalyuhapcl aylhatlua. Whapluaz dpao h wylzjypwapvu vm vyhs rlavjvuhgvsl mvy mbunhs pumljapvuz zovbsk il ylmlyylk ihjr av aolpy kvjavyz.</w> <w>Vyhs rlavjvuhgvsl mvy Jbzopun'z zfukyvtl huk avwpjhs wyvkbjaz jvuahpupun rlavjvuhgvsl hyl uva hmmljalk if aopz hkcpjl.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        The. kvzl 200 tn khpsf dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm jvipjpzaha-ivvzalk ylnptluz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 400–600&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2–3 kpcpklk kvzlz, pujylhzlk av 800–1200&uizw;tn khpsf; thpualuhujl 400–800&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2–3 kpcpklk kvzlz, mvy kvzl apayhapvuz pu whapluaz dpao lzahispzolk kvzl, hkqbzatluaz pu hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf, vy jvujvtpahua jvyapjvzalyvpk ylwshjltlua aolyhwf, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; theptbt 1200&uizw;tn wly khf.
Hwwsf adpjl dllrsf mvy 2–4 dllrz, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.
Hwwsf adpjl dllrsf mvy 2–4 dllrz, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm zlivyyovlpj klythapapz huk khukybmm

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf lclyf 1–2&uizw;dllrz, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.
Hwwsf lclyf 1–2&uizw;dllrz, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm zlivyyovlpj klythapapz huk khukybmm

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf vujl khpsf mvy theptbt 5 khfz, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.
Hwwsf vujl khpsf mvy theptbt 5 khfz, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.
Hwwsf vujl khpsf mvy bw av 3 khfz ilmvyl zbu lewvzbyl, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.
Hwwsf vujl khpsf mvy bw av 3 khfz ilmvyl zbu lewvzbyl, slhcl wylwhyhapvu vu mvy 3–5 tpubalz ilmvyl ypuzpun.
Hwwsf 1–2 aptlz h khf, av il hwwsplk av aol huvnlupahs hylh.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy LJN ilmvyl huk vul dllr hmaly pupaphapvu, huk aolu hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk aolylhmaly.</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><o4>Hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf</o4><w>Tvupavy hkyluhs mbujapvu dpaopu vul dllr vm pupaphapvu, aolu ylnbshysf aolylhmaly. Dolu jvyapzvs slclsz hyl uvythspzlk vy jsvzl av ahynla huk lmmljapcl kvzl lzahispzolk, tvupavy lclyf 3–6 tvuaoz hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm hbavpttbul kpzlhzl klclsvwtlua vy lehjlyihapvu hmaly uvythspzhapvu vm jvyapzvs slclsz. Pm zftwavtz zbnnlzapcl vm hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf zbjo hz mhapnbl, huvyleph, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvuhayhltph, ofwlyrhshltph, huk/vy ofwvnsfjhltph vjjby, tlhzbyl jvyapzvs slclsz huk kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua altwvyhypsf (jhu il ylzbtlk aolylhmaly ha svdly kvzl) vy ylkbjl kvzl huk pm uljlzzhyf, pupaphal jvyapjvzalyvpk zbizapabapvu.</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><o4>Olwhavavepjpaf</o4><w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua, aolu dllrsf mvy 1 tvuao hmaly pupaphapvu, aolu tvuaosf mvy 6 tvuaoz—tvyl mylxbluasf pm kvzl hkqbzalk vy hiuvyths spcly mbujapvu klaljalk.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.
kybnJvualua.uvuUoz:
Upgvyhs

® jylht pz uva wylzjypihisl pu UOZ wypthyf jhyl lejlwa mvy aol aylhatlua vm zlivyyovlpj klythapapz huk wpafyphzpz clyzpjvsvy; lukvyzl wylzjypwapvu 'ZSZ'.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm spcly kpzvykly, huk hkcpzlk av kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua huk zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz huvyleph, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, mhapnbl, qhbukpjl, hikvtpuhs whpu, vy khyr bypul klclsvw.</w> <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk hszv il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Kpggpulzz huk zvtuvslujl thf hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u Dpao vyhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—alyhavnlupj pu

hupths

zabkplz. \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpvlklth</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ahzal hsalylk</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hkyluhs puzbmmpjplujf; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; uhbzlh; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hsslynpj jvukpapvuz; hzaoluph; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; olhkhjol; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Lejlzzpcl alhypun; mvsspjbspapz; ohpy johunlz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Mlcly; olwhapj kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Lfl pyypahapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hsjvovs puavslyhujl; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hyaoyhsnph; hgvvzwlytph; kyf tvbao; lwpzahepz; mshabslujl; mvuahulssl ibsnpun; nfuhljvthzaph; ova msbzo; puzvtuph; puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk; thshpzl; tluzaybhs kpzvykly; tfhsnph; ulycvbzulzz; whwpssvlklth; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wovavwoviph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; avunbl kpzjvsvbyhapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun olwhavavepjpaf ylwvyalk yhylsf dpao vyhs bzl. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl pm olwhapj lugftlz pujylhzlk av slzz aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm olwhapj lugftlz ha slhza 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths.</w>\u\u\u
